changes.description: Added dedicated Reports Module with Stock Movement and Monthly GST reports
WhatsApp Integration: Send Invoices and Quotations directly to clients with one click
Cloud Document Links: PDFs are stored in the cloud for permanent WhatsApp accessibility
Custom Document Numbering: Configure unique prefixes and sequences in Settings
Replaced Puppeteer with native Electron printing for faster PDF generation
Smart Networking: Added dynamic port detection to solve startup errors
Fixed visual glitches in the new reporting interfaces
Resolved edge-case bugs affecting document saving and startup
Increased font sizes in Quotation module for better readability
Improved internal error log formatting for diagnostics
Smoothed out interactions in data entry forms across modules
Applied patch fixes for minor stability issues
Enhanced Form Validation: Proactive error prevention across all modules
Robust Backups: Bundled native database tools for reliable self-contained backups
Updated Waybill layout with Compact Totals display
Polished Quotation PDF engine to fix layout shifts
Migrated internal routes to custom logging system
Fixed critical issue where backups targeted the wrong directory
Resolved logic bugs in Invoice saving and calculation
Fixed auto-updater stability by removing conflicting loggers
Significant codebase cleanup and removal of debug logs for optimization
Automatic Updates: App now detects and installs new versions automatically
Keyboard Navigation: Switch modules with Ctrl+Tab and use arrow keys in lists
Service History: Dedicated view for tracking item/client service records
Solar Data Worksheet: New module for energy saving calculations
Unified Document Design: Professional layout overhaul for all document types
Added global search bars and filtering options across all modules
Stock Printing: Generate and print filtered inventory reports
Dashboard Stats now support URL parameters for deep linking
Fixed missing images/logos in printed documents
Fixed total calculations in Dashboard and Invoices for financial accuracy
Corrected Pending Services count logic
Purchase Order Module: Create and track supplier orders
Enhanced Stock Tracking with company/brand categorization
Updated sidebar navigation for consistent behavior
Improved local database backup reliability
Overhauled quotation viewing experience
Fixed layout overflow errors in quotation forms and PDFs
